ai-thag4.3:1.2_0: that here we need to be restrained.
ai-thag4.3:1.3_0: But those who do understand this,
ai-thag4.3:2.1_0: And when those who don’t understand
ai-thag4.3:2.2_0: behave as though they were immortal,
ai-thag4.3:2.3_0: those who know, and those who understand Dhamma,
ai-thag4.3:2.4_0: are like the healthy among the sick.
ai-thag4.3:3.1_0: Whatever lax deed there is and dragging at all,
ai-thag4.3:4.3_0: is as far from true Dhamma
ai-thag4.3:4.4_0: as the sky from the earth.
